From: Hagop Ghazarian 
Sent: Tuesday, May 28, 2024 1:59 PM
To: Bernardita Ramos <Bernardita.Ramos@chalhoub.com <mailto:Bernardita.Ramos@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: Nada Boutros <Nada.Boutros@chalhoub.com <mailto:Nada.Boutros@chalhoub.com> >; Mridul Nambiar <Mridul.Nambiar@nascodubai.com <mailto:Mridul.Nambiar@nascodubai.com> >; Savio Salvador D'costa <Savio.Dcosta@nascodubai.com <mailto:Savio.Dcosta@nascodubai.com> >
Subject: KYC Details Required - Insurance

 

Hi Bernardita,

 

Hope all is well.

 

We need the KYC details for the following companies:

 

REAL EMIRATES LLC/ Chalhob Group Limited/ The National Luxury Company LLC

 

The documents required are the following:

 

*	Filled up KYC document
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA) 
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company) 
*	Valid Passport copy or EID copy of the Individual Shareholders 
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors 
*	Valid ID Copies of Authorized Signatories 
*	TRN certificate (if there is changes on last year documents)
*	Audited Financials   

 

Note:

*	Filled up KYC document
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA) 
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company) 
*	Valid Passport copy or EID copy of the Individual Shareholders 
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors 
*	Valid ID Copies of Authorized Signatories 
*	TRN certificate (if there is changes on last year documents)
*	Audited Financials   

 

Note: 

*	If the shareholder of our customer is a company, then it is mandatory to collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company
*	KYC data of our customer, beneficial owners, directors, and authorized signatories must be entered in the respective fields in our core systems.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Kind Regards,

Hagop


--------------------------------------------------
